page.title: 11HEYBROOK BAY 2
page.content: The population has trebled since 1960. Three houses were built in{Longlands {Drive,}but the builder was stopped and permission was given to build{only {bungalows. The original plan}was to include shops,a community hall and a play area,but the builder went bank- rupt.Afterwards the Estate was finish- ed by{a succession of builders.}Two disadvantages,perhaps,are that there are{no shops}and,in very bad gales overhead cables cause havoc.{26 people were interviewed.Of these 2 have lived in HB over 50 years,8 had lived there for 10-20 years,and 16 for less than 10 years.{Of the 26 ,9 thought HB was {peaceful, 6 liked the scenery,2 liked {everything about living there,and 8 l- {iked the sea.Asked about disadvantages {3 said there were none,9 said no shops {9 not enough transport,and 4 said it {was cold in winter.
